subject: [Radiance-general] 3- or 5-phase method in simulation programs
body:
Does anybody have a list of simulation programs using the three-phase or
five-phase method?

My list is short:
- DaySim / EcoTect
- OpenStudio / EnergyPlus

Are there others?

Tim Perry
(916) 505-3634
